Header.title: Cryptocurrency Prediction
Header.paragraph: A Website that uses Deep Learning Model Bidirectional LSTM with Wrapper and MDI Feature Selection appraoch to predict prices of Bitcoin and Ethereum.

About.paragraph: A cryptocurrency is a type of electronic currency that is created and kept. Cryptocurrency prices are extremely volatile, making them both high-benefit and high-risk investments.. The goal of this project is to address this problem and forecast the price of the top two cryptocurrencies, Bitcoin and Ethereum as accurately as possible by taking into account several factors that influence the price of the cryptocurrencies mentioned above, as well as historical and real-time data.

Features.title: Interactive
Features.text: Recent Data will be fed to model and model will be monitored to produce best results.

Features.title: Alerts
Features.text: For any Huge spike or expected change an email wil be generated.

Features.title: Graphical Representation
Features.text: Indicators and Prediction value will be shown in graphical format.

Features.title: User Registeration
Features.text: Users can register and login to website for perks such as high change emails and monthly report.
